content: Oh great, it's you guys again. Last time I waited HOURS and my lights still weren’t fixed! Hoping it's better this time. Can we just get this over with?
I'm really sorry you had a bad experience last time. I'd like to help get everything handled quickly for you today. May I have your name to get started?
Sandra. But let's not waste time on the basics—just fix my kitchen outlets ASAP.
Thank you, Sandra. Can you please share your address so we can make sure our team is ready to help you as quickly as possible?
115 Greenleaf Ave. Just hurry. I don't have the patience today.
Thank you! I’m confirming your address is 115 Greenleaf Ave. I’ll get the next available electrician for you. What time today works best for you, or do you need someone as soon as possible?
ASAP, like I said. If you can’t do that, tell me so now.
I understand, Sandra. Let me check for the soonest available electrician in your area.
We have an electrician available today between 2:30 and 4:00 PM. Should I reserve this slot for you?
Fine. Book it. If anyone is late, I’m leaving and not letting them in!
I’ve reserved your appointment for today between 2:30 and 4:00 PM. Our electrician will notify you before arrival. Thank you, Sandra—we’ll do our best to make things right.
